name: 曾恕銘
objective:
教學目標
本課程內容包含 I) 數位通訊系統，II) 行動通訊系統，III) 無線傳輸技術的基礎和最新發展如 B5G/6G D2D、SCMA 、NOMA、NOMA 、RIS、FD、HBF for mmWave/ Terahertz 等)，使學生能閱讀理解通訊與訊號處理領域研究論文，並從事學位論文研究。
schedule:
內容、進度
Part I Digital Communication Systems
█Digital communications (including random processes, linear algebra)
Part II Mobile Communication Systems
█Mobile communication fundamentals (cellular system, propagation model, diversity)
Part III Wireless Transmissition Technology Fundamentals and Recent Advances
█CDMA/SCMA for B5G/6G (new)
█Data detection/interference cancellation for CDMA etc.
█MIMO (Spatial Multiplexing/MU-MIMO/STBC/distributed STBC/beamforming) 
█OFDM (A) (principle/synchronization/channel estimation/power allocation)
█5G  key tech application scenerios and B5G/6G  NOMA (Non-Orthogonal Mulptiple Access)、SCMA (Sparse Code Mulptiple Access)、FD (full duplex) 、RIS (Reconfigurable Intelligent Surface)  (new)
█  Information theory &  video source coding 
█  Error Resilience  video cross-layer  optimization problem foumulation and solution (AMC MDC HARQ)
